translation.Name: Rio Note - Survivor #1
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_0: I will probably never forget what happened last night. I was just relaxing at the beach, and suddenly a big horde of red eyed zombies came out of nowhere and they were everywhere!
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_1: While I was running I saw lots of those red eyed monsters getting inside the hotel, where my wife was... I feel so horrible, running like a coward.
